item.title: 苹果公司新泽西州专卖店工人申请成立工会
item.description: 在美国各行各业推动成立工会的背景下，苹果公司位于新泽西州肖特希尔斯的专卖店的一名员工周三表示，该专卖店的工人已经申请加入工会，他是组织委员会的成员之一。【原文：Workers at Apple's store in Short Hills, New Jersey, have filed for union representation, a staff member who is part of the organizing committee said on Wednesday amid a push for unionization across sectors in corporate America.】

item.title: 早间竞价美国通胀冲击日元，下一个是中国 CPI
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，美国司法部对新日铁与美国钢铁公司的交易展开深入调查
item.description: 美国司法部已对新日铁公司斥资 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司一事展开深入的反垄断调查。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department has opened up an in-depth antitrust investigation into Nippon Steel's $14.1 billion takeover of U.S. Steel , the Politico reported on Wednesday citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 空中客车公司面临支持喷气机增产的前期成本问题
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）财务总监周三表示，在准备提高喷气机产量的过程中，该公司正在产生前期成本，并计划在达到产量目标后留出喘息空间来消化这些成本。【原文：Airbus is incurring up-front costs as it prepares for higher jet production and plans a breathing space to absorb them once it reaches its output goal, its finance chief said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国司法部对 Regeneron 提起诉讼，指控其药品定价存在欺诈行为
item.description: 美国司法部周三表示，已对 Regeneron 制药公司提起虚假索赔诉讼，称该公司提交了虚假的平均销售价格报告。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Wednesday it had filed a false claims act complaint against Regeneron Pharmaceuticals , claiming the company filed false average sales price reports.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会警告 Uniswap Labs 可能采取执法行动
item.description: Uniswap Labs 是全球最大的加密货币交易所之一，该公司在周三的一篇博文中表示，美国证券交易委员会已通知可能对其采取执法行动。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has notified of potential enforcement action against Uniswap Labs, the main developer behind one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges, the company said in a blog post on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会调查费城福特Mach-E致命车祸
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）周三表示，正在对 3 月 3 日发生在费城 I-95 州际高速公路上的福特野马 Mach-E 与两辆静止汽车之间的致命车祸展开调查。【原文：The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said on Wednesday it was opening an investigation into a March 3 fatal crash between a Ford Mustang Mach-E and two stationary cars on the I-95 interstate highway in Philadelphia.】

item.title: Vertex 制药公司将以 49 亿美元收购阿尔卑斯免疫科学公司
item.description: Vertex Pharmaceuticals 公司周三表示，将以每股 65 美元或约 49 亿美元的现金收购疗法开发商 Alpine Immune Sciences 公司。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals will acquire therapy developer Alpine Immune Sciences for $65 per share, or about $4.9 billion in cash, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会称西南航空发动机盖丢失系维修问题所致
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）主席表示，西南航空公司一架波音 737-800 飞机周日在丹佛起飞时发动机盖脱落并击中机翼襟翼，这是维修问题造成的。【原文：The chair of the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said the loss of an engine cover on a Southwest Airlines Boeing 737-800 on Sunday that fell off during takeoff in Denver and struck the wing flap was the result of a maintenance issue.】

item.title: 美国政府对苹果公司的反垄断诉讼案在法官回避后换了新法官
item.description: 美国司法部指控苹果公司非法垄断智能手机市场的大案周三被重新分配给新泽西州的美国地区法官朱利安-尼尔斯（Julien Neals）审理，此前另一位法官表示由于潜在的利益冲突他不能审理此案。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department's blockbuster case accusing Apple of unlawfully monopolizing the smartphone market was reassigned to U.S. District Judge Julien Neals in New Jersey on Wednesday after another judge said he could not hear it due to a potential conflict of interest.】

item.title: 美联储官员准备放缓资产负债表缩减步伐
item.description: 美联储官员正准备明显放慢允许国债从美联储资产负债表中撤出的速度，为最终结束缩表做准备。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are preparing to notably slow the pace at which they allow Treasury securities to come off the Fed's balance sheet as they prepare for an eventual end to the drawdown.】

item.title: 巴克莱将美联储降息预期下调至 2024 年一次
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）经济学团队周三表示，鉴于今天公布的消费者物价指数（CPI）数据意外上扬，该团队目前认为美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）在2024年只会降息一次，降幅为25个基点（bps）。【原文：Barclays economics team on Wednesday said it now sees the U.S. Federal Reserve cutting rates just one time in 2024, by 25 basis points (bps), in light of the upside surprise to the consumer price index (CPI) data released today.】

item.title: 会议纪要显示，美联储对通货紧缩的 "信心 "并未因近期数据而增强
item.description: 根据美国中央银行 3 月 19-20 日的会议纪要，政策制定者保持了在 2024 年降息三次的基线观点。【原文：Federal Reserve officials worried last month that progress on inflation might have stalled and a longer period of tight monetary policy be needed to tame the pace of price increases, according to the minutes of the U.S. central bank's March 19-20 meeting at which policymakers kept a baseline view for three interest rate cuts in 2024.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，派拉蒙三名董事会成员将在与 Skydance 的合并谈判中下台
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，在与 Skydance Media 公司的合并谈判中，派拉蒙全球公司董事会的三名成员预计将退出这家娱乐巨头。【原文：Three members on the board of Paramount Global are expected to exit the entertainment giant amid merger talks with Skydance Media, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 音乐厂牌 UMG 宣布与中国 TF Entertainment 建立发行合作伙伴关系
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周三表示，其大中华区部门已与中国娱乐公司 TF Entertainment 建立了全球数字发行合作伙伴关系。【原文：Universal Music Group on Wednesday said its unit in Greater China has entered a global digital distribution partnership with Chinese entertainment company TF Entertainment.】

item.title: 世界银行下调拉美地区 2024 年国内生产总值预测，称竞争是增长的关键
item.description: 世界银行周三将拉丁美洲和加勒比地区 2024 年的经济增长预测从之前预计的 2.3%下调至 1.6%，称该地区的经济增长速度仍然落后于世界其他地区。【原文：The World Bank on Wednesday downgraded its 2024 economic growth forecast for Latin America and the Caribbean to 1.6% from its previous estimate of 2.3%, saying the region continues to lag growth rates registered in other parts of the world.】

item.title: 阿根廷农田降雨降温应能阻止叶蝉蔓延
item.description: 布宜诺斯艾利斯谷物交易所周三表示，阿根廷主要农业区未来几天将迎来降雨和降温，预计这将有助于遏制一种损害该国玉米产量的昆虫的蔓延。【原文：Argentina's key agricultural regions will receive rain and a drop in temperatures in the coming days, the Buenos Aires grain exchange said on Wednesday, a combination expected to help curb the spread of an insect that has damaged the country's corn lots.】

item.title: 航空公司寻求美国联邦航空局延长纽约最低飞行要求的削减 -- 信件
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，各大航空公司以空中交通管制员短缺为由，要求拜登政府将纽约市地区拥挤机场最低飞行要求的削减期限延长至 2025 年 10 月。【原文：Major airlines are asking the Biden administration to extend cuts to minimum flight requirements at congested New York City-area airports through October 2025, citing air traffic controller shortages, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 分析师称，随着消费疲软，阿根廷 3 月通胀将再次放缓
item.description: 据路透社调查的分析师估计，阿根廷 3 月份的月通胀率可能降至 12%，这将标志着物价连续第三个月下降，对新任自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊的经济改革运动也是一个推动。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate likely edged down to 12% in March, analysts polled by Reuters estimated, which would mark a third straight month of deceleration for prices and a boost for new libertarian President Javier Milei's economic reform drive.】

item.title: 红海危机迫使运营商使用更多集装箱船，加剧了排放问题
item.description: 由于当前的红海危机促使航运业使用更多的船只和更长的航线来确保全球海上贸易的顺利进行，航运业限制碳足迹的承诺可能会遭受挫折。【原文：The shipping industry's pledge to limit its carbon footprint may suffer a setback as the current Red Sea crisis prompts it to use more vessels and take longer routes to ensure the smooth sailing of global maritime trade.】

item.title: 独家报道富士康考虑在管理层重组中轮换首席执行官
item.description: 三位知情人士告诉路透社，苹果供应商富士康正在考虑引入轮值首席执行官制度，对其管理结构进行重大改革，旨在培养未来人才。【原文：Apple supplier Foxconn is considering introducing a rotating chief executive system in a major overhaul of its management structure designed to nurture future talent, three sources briefed on the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道德国电信和空中客车抨击允许大科技公司访问欧盟云数据的计划
item.description: 德国电信（Deutsche Telekom）、Orange、空中客车（Airbus）和其他 15 家欧盟公司对允许亚马逊（Amazon）、Alphabet 旗下谷歌（Google）和微软（Microsoft）竞标高度敏感的欧盟云计算合同的提议提出了批评。【原文：Deutsche Telekom , Orange , Airbus and 15 other EU companies have criticised a proposal that would allow Amazon , Alphabet's Google and Microsoft to bid for highly sensitive EU cloud computing contracts.】

item.title: Roblox 借助广告技术公司 PubMatic 提高视频广告销售额
item.description: 广告技术公司 Roblox 周三表示，该公司已聘请 PubMatic 帮助提升该游戏平台预计将于今年晚些时候推出的新视频广告的销售量。【原文：Roblox has hired PubMatic to help ramp up sales of new video advertisements the gaming platform expects to launch later this year, the advertising tech firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Meta 首次推出新一代人工智能芯片
item.description: Meta Platforms 周三公布了该公司下一代内部人工智能加速芯片的详细信息。【原文：Meta Platforms unveiled details on Wednesday about the next generation of the company's in-house artificial intelligence accelerator chip.】

item.title: 优步加强乘客安全功能
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周三表示，该公司正在增强其针对全球乘客的安全功能，以最大限度地降低风险并确保夜间女性的安全。【原文：Uber Technologies said on Wednesday that it is boosting its safety features for passengers around the world, as it looks to minimize risk and ensure security for women at night.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）就 737 MAX 9 登机门插头调查与波音公司进行新的面谈
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会本周将对波音公司和联邦航空管理局人员进行新一轮访谈，以调查 1 月 5 日阿拉斯加航空公司 737 MAX 9 中空紧急事件。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board is conducting a new round of interviews with Boeing and Federal Aviation Administration personnel this week in its probe into the Jan. 5 Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 mid-air emergency.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份批发库存强劲增长
item.description: 2 月份美国批发库存稳健反弹，表明库存可能会促进第一季度的经济增长。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories rebounded solidly in February, suggesting that inventories could contribute to economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 政府公告：美国限制与俄罗斯、中国和阿联酋的 11 家实体开展贸易
item.description: 美国商务部周三将俄罗斯、中国和阿拉伯联合酋长国的11家实体列入政府出口管制名单，原因是这些实体违反了与制裁伊朗、乌克兰战争和袭击中东油轮有关的规定。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department added 11 entities from Russia, China and the United Arab Emirates on Wednesday to a government export control list for violations pertaining to Iran sanctions, the war in Ukraine and attacks on oil tankers in the Middle East, according to a federal government posting.】

item.title: 微策略公司引领加密货币领域空头损失，3 月以来损失 20 亿美元
item.description: 根据 S3 Partners 的数据，自 3 月份以来，押注微策略的卖空者已经损失了 19.2 亿美元，这凸显了该股涨势所带来的打击，该股的表现超过了比特币。【原文：Short sellers betting against MicroStrategy have lost $1.92 billion since March, according to data from S3 Partners, highlighting the hit from a rally that has helped the stock outperform bitcoin .】

item.title: 越南命令 Netflix 停止宣传和分发其游戏
item.description: 越南广播管理局周四表示，由于美国流媒体平台 Netflix 公司尚未获得游戏服务许可证，越南已下令 Netflix 公司在 4 月 25 日之前停止在该国投放广告和发行游戏。【原文：Vietnam has ordered Netflix Inc to stop advertising and distributing its games in the country before April 25 as the U.S. streaming platform has not yet been granted a license for games services, its broadcasting authority said on Thursday.】
